subject: Simsonn pedals plus x
description_text: Hello. I connected the pedals to the computer, and the phantom brake presses started in the games. I took out the cable, plugged it in, error: usb not recognized appeared, the same error occurred with the other cable and the computer. simsonn manager 2.1.1 is installed

conversations.body_text: Hi A A,   Please uninstall the old version from your computer first, then download and install the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2.   https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download     First, please ensure you are using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. Also, connect only one SIMSONN control box at a time—do not connect multiple units simultaneously.    For Pro series control boxes: If the version is 1.7.1, you can update the firmware via: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware → pedals-plus.sfu (This method does not apply to 1.7.0 control boxes.)    For PlusX pedals: Only the plusx.sfu firmware can be used for updates.
